devdoc.details: Whitelisted accounts have been approved by a WhitelistAdmin to perform certain actions (e.g. participate in a crowdsale). This role is special in that the only accounts that can add it are WhitelistAdmins (who can also remove it), and not Whitelisteds themselves.
devdoc.title: WhitelistedRole
